title: Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas and a resolution
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health and Social Care
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health and Social Care 
Professionals Act 2005 (Section 95(3)) (Variation of title: Chiropodist) 
Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health social care professional act 2005 (section 95(3)) (variation title chiropodist) regulation 2023

title: Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas and a resolution
heading: 2. For the purposes of section 95(3)(a) (amended by section 37 of the
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of section 95(3)(a) (amended by section 37 of the 
Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 33 of 2014)) of the Health 
and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005), the title of 
chiropodist is prescribed as a variant of the title of podiatrist specified in 
section 4(1)(g) of that Act and may, in addition to the title of podiatrist, be used 
by registrants of that profession. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 January, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [55] 3

title: Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas and a resolution
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These regulations will protect the title of Chiropodist as a variant of the title of 
Podiatrist for the exclusive use of professionals registered with the Podiatrists 
Registration Board. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [55]
